title: Le Crobag - Friedrichstr Station
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Take-out, Bakery, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain bakery branch in the Friedrichstr. station, in the main hall. Sells baked goods, sandwiches, and hot drinks. Offers vegan baguettes filled with either tofu, basil and tomato, or herb spread and cucumber.
